alert.note: Alert for Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Snyder; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Tioga; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 2:58PM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SUNDAY TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central Pennsylvania. * WHEN...From 4 PM Sunday to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of over 1 inch per hour possible Sunday evening.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions. To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.
